body: Honest, I love this artist's art style but the story's are total shit.

@TeslaHaxz Not entirely sure if I understood it but basically the guy is writing a novel about a hero who hypnotizes girls and makes them his slave. Walking home with his editor/childhood friend? She is about to be hit by a truck he jumps in front of it trying to save her fails and they both die. Both their souls are summoned by a Goddess, for some reason the guys soul is unconscious and the Goddess is sorry and reads the guys novel (which was brought in there for some reason). Then the girl asks the Goddess to make the world for them to live in and wait before being reincarnated back to reality, and she asks to become the male MC while the guy is made into the female heroine. For at least a year the now male MC uses his hypno app to make the now female heroine and a few other girls into his slaves, raping them and for some few moments let them be in a lucid state. Eventually the Goddess returns and tells them she can now put them back into reality, story ends with gender switch.
I think the one who ask for translation will be hit by Truck kun and sent into the said series
Sasuga Truck-kun, always coming up with the wackiest times to show up
So what happened, dude reincarnated into the chick, and the girl into the guy? And the girl (now a guy) can hypnotize people? Or the guy (now a girl) is the only one hypnotized?
I request a translation. I wasnt asking so i wont die
